programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E01 - Episode 1
programme.desc: The much-loved and hugely successful Bafta-winning series Race Across the World returns to BBC One and BBC iPlayer for a fourth season. Five teams of intrepid Brits will battle it out in a breath-taking 15,000 kilometres race across Eastern Asia through some of the world’s most populous regions and some of its most unexplored.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E02 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Bafta winning ‘Race Across the World’ is back, this time on an adrenaline fuelled adventure through Asia. Our five intrepid teams are taking on an epic 15,000 journey from Northern Japan to Lombok in Indonesia. Armed with only the cash equivalent of the airfare to fly the route they will have to navigate their way through some of the world’s most populous, and most unexplored countries without smartphones, internet access or bank cards. They will need to think fast, move at breakneck speed and rely on the kindness of strangers to make it to the finish line.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E03 - Episode 3
programme.desc: The much-loved hit series ‘Race Across the World’ is back on BBC One as five teams attempt to race a breath-taking 15,000 kilometres through East and Southeast Asia; from northernmost Japan to the finish line in Lombok, an idyllic Indonesian paradise. Without smartphones, internet access or bank cards, and armed only with the cash equivalent of the airfare to fly the route, our teams must travel this extraordinary journey at ground level.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E04 - Episode 4
programme.desc: In the bafta-winning, much loved series ‘Race Across the World’ five teams have been set the challenge to race 15,000 kilometres across East and Southeast Asia, passing through seven checkpoints. Without smartphones, internet access or bank cards, and armed only with the cash equivalent of the airfare to fly the route. Their skill, ingenuity and determination will be tested to the extreme as they navigate some of the world’s most populous regions and some of the most unexplored….

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E05 - Episode 5
programme.desc: The bafta-winning hit series ‘Race Across the World’ is well underway. After journeying through Japan, South Korea, Vietnam and Cambodia and crossing the border into Thailand, the four remaining teams have reached the halfway mark in the race across Asia to the Indonesian paradise of Lombok. The leader board has been flipped on its head, and for the first time, in a dramatic turnaround retired couple Stephen and Viv are at the top and Alfie and Owen have dropped to the bottom with an 11-hour gap separating them.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World - Episode 6
programme.desc: Four teams remain in the race of a lifetime battling it out for pole position in the much-loved Bafta-winning series Race Across the World.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E07 - Episode 7
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode of the heart-warming BBC hit series Race Across the World, the finish line is in sight for the four remaining teams.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E08 - Episode 8
programme.desc: After racing nearly 14,000 kilometres, over seven weeks, through 7 countries it’s all come down to…12 minutes. That’s all the separates the first two teams as they embark on the final leg of their Race Across the World from Jakarta to Lombok where a prize of £20,000 awaits the winning team.

programme.title: Race Across the World
programme.sub-title: Race Across the World S04 E09 - Episode 9
programme.desc: Six months after finishing their race across the world, the five intrepid teams are reunited in London for the first time. Together, they look back at the 51-day thrilling adventure that began in northernmost Japan and covered 15,000 kilometres through seven countries, taking in some of the world’s most beautiful, populous and remote places to reach the finish line. Unseen moments will be shown, and shocking revelations made.
